void pushup(ll r)
{
    if(!r)
        return;
    tr[r].sz=tr[ls(r)].sz+tr[rs(r)].sz+1;
}

void split(ll r,ll &xrt,ll &yrt,ll v)
{
    // rä¸ºéœ€è¦åˆ†è£‚çš„æ ‘çš„æ ¹
    // xrtä¸ºåˆ†è£‚åå°†å¾—åˆ°å·¦æ ‘çš„æ ‘æ ¹
    // yrtåä¹‹
    if(!r)
        xrt=yrt=0;
    else if(v<tr[r].val)
    {
        yrt=r;
        split(ls(r),xrt,ls(r),v);
    }
    else
    {
        xrt=r;
        split(rs(r),rs(r),yrt,v); // ç­‰äºvçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ†åˆ°å·¦æ ‘é‡Œ
    }
    pushup(r);
}

void merge(ll &r,ll xrt,ll yrt)
{
    // rä¸ºåˆå¹¶åçš„æ–°æ ¹
    // xrtä¸ºå‚ä¸åˆå¹¶çš„å·¦å­æ ‘çš„æ ¹
    // yrtåä¹‹
    if(!xrt||!yrt)
        r=xrt+yrt;
    else if(tr[xrt].pri<tr[yrt].pri)
    {
        r=xrt;
        merge(rs(r),rs(r),yrt);
    }
    else
    {
        r=yrt;
        merge(ls(r),xrt,ls(r));
    }
    pushup(r);
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define rep(c,i,a,b) for(c i=a;i<=b;++i)
#define per(c,i,a,b) for(c i=a;i>=b;--i)
#define ls(r) tr[r].ch[0]
#define rs(r) tr[r].ch[1]

const ll MAXN=5e5+3,INF=0x3f3f3f3f;

struct FHQ_Treap
{
    ll ch[2];
    ll sz;
    ll val;
    ll pri;
}tr[MAXN];
ll pcnt,rt,rt1,rt2;

void pushup(ll r)
{
    if(!r)
        return;
    tr[r].sz=tr[ls(r)].sz+tr[rs(r)].sz+1;
}

void split(ll r,ll &xrt,ll &yrt,ll v)
{
    if(!r)
        xrt=yrt=0;
    else if(v<tr[r].val)
    {
        yrt=r;
        split(ls(r),xrt,ls(r),v);
    }
    else
    {
        xrt=r;
        split(rs(r),rs(r),yrt,v);
    }
    pushup(r);
}

void merge(ll &r,ll xrt,ll yrt)
{
    if(!xrt||!yrt)
        r=xrt+yrt;
    else if(tr[xrt].pri<tr[yrt].pri)
    {
        r=xrt;
        merge(rs(r),rs(r),yrt);
    }
    else
    {
        r=yrt;
        merge(ls(r),xrt,ls(r));
    }
    pushup(r);
}

void ins(ll &r,ll x)
{
    split(r,rt1,rt2,x);
    tr[++pcnt].val=x,tr[pcnt].pri=rand(),tr[pcnt].sz=1,r=pcnt;
    merge(rt1,rt1,pcnt);
    merge(r,rt1,rt2);
}

void del(ll &r,ll x)
{
    ll rt3;
    split(r,rt1,rt2,x);
    split(rt1,rt1,rt3,x-1);
    merge(rt1,rt1,rt3);
    merge(r,rt1,rt2);
}

ll getrank(ll r,ll x) // æ•°xçš„æ’å
{
    if(r==0)
        return 1;
    if(tr[r].val<x)
        return tr[ls(r)].sz+1+getrank(rs(r),x);
    return getrank(ls(r),x);
}

ll xth(ll r,ll x) // ç¬¬xä¸ªæ•°
{
    if(tr[ls(r)].sz>=x)
        return xth(ls(r),x);
    if(tr[ls(r)].sz+1>=x)
        return tr[r].val;
    return xth(rs(r),x-tr[ls(r)].sz-1);
}

ll getpre(ll r,ll x) // xçš„å‰é©±
{
    if(r==0)
        return -INF;
    if(x<=tr[r].val)
        return getpre(ls(r),x);
    return max(tr[r].val,getpre(rs(r),x));
}

ll getnxt(ll r,ll x) // xçš„åç»§
{
    if(r==0)
        return INF;
    if(x>=tr[r].val)
        return getnxt(rs(r),x);
    return min(tr[r].val,getnxt(ls(r),x));
}

int main()
{
    srand(time(0));
    ll n;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    while(n--)
    {
        ll op,x;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&op,&x);
        if(op==1)
            ins(rt,x);
        if(op==2)
            del(rt,x);
        if(op==3)
            printf("%lld\n",grank(rt,x));
        if(op==4)
            printf("%lld\n",xth(rt,x));
        if(op==5)
            printf("%lld\n",pre(rt,x));
        if(op==6)
            printf("%lld\n",nxt(rt,x));
    }
    return 0;
}

void pushup(ll r)
{
    if(!r)
        return;
    tr[r].sz=tr[ls(r)].sz+tr[rs(r)].sz+tr[r].cnt;
}

void rote(ll x)
{
    ll y=fa[x],z=fa[y],flg=(x==rs(fa[x]));
    tr[y].ch[flg]=tr[x].ch[!flg];
    if(tr[x].ch[!flg]) fa[tr[x].ch[!flg]]=y;
    tr[x].ch[!flg]=y;
    fa[y]=x;
    fa[x]=z;
    if(z) tr[z].ch[y==rs(z)]=x;
    pushup(y),pushup(x);
}

void splay(ll x,ll goal) // è¿™é‡Œgoal==0æ—¶ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå°†xè½¬åˆ°æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹
{
    // è¿™é‡Œ3è¡ŒåŒ…å«äº†æ—‹è½¬çš„3ç§æƒ…å†µï¼Œè¯·è‡ªè¡Œç†è§£ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¸ä½œè¿‡å¤šè§£é‡Š

        if(fa[y]!=goal)

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define ls(r) tr[r].ch[0]
#define rs(r) tr[r].ch[1]

const ll MAXN=5e5+5,INF=0x3f3f3f3f;

struct Splay
{
    ll ch[2],sz,val,cnt;
}tr[MAXN];
ll rt,pcnt;
ll fa[MAXN];

void pushup(ll r)
{
    if(!r)
        return;
    tr[r].sz=tr[ls(r)].sz+tr[rs(r)].sz+tr[r].cnt;
}

void rote(ll x)
{
    ll y=fa[x],z=fa[y],flg=(x==rs(fa[x]));
    tr[y].ch[flg]=tr[x].ch[!flg];
    if(tr[x].ch[!flg]) fa[tr[x].ch[!flg]]=y;
    tr[x].ch[!flg]=y;
    fa[y]=x;
    fa[x]=z;
    if(z) tr[z].ch[y==rs(z)]=x;
    pushup(y),pushup(x);
}

void splay(ll x)
{
    for(ll y;(y=fa[x]);rote(x))
    if(fa[y]) rote(((rs(fa[y])==y)==(rs(y)==x))?y:x);
    rt=x;
}

void ins(ll x)
{
    if(!rt)
    {
        tr[++pcnt].val=x;
        tr[pcnt].cnt++;
        rt=pcnt;
        pushup(rt);
        return;
    }
    ll cur=rt,f=0;
    while(1)
    {
        if(tr[cur].val==x)
        {
            tr[cur].cnt++;
            pushup(cur);
            pushup(f);
            splay(cur);
            return;
        }
        f=cur;
        cur=tr[cur].ch[tr[cur].val<x];
        if(!cur)
        {
            tr[++pcnt].val=x;
            tr[pcnt].cnt++;
            fa[pcnt]=f;
            tr[f].ch[tr[f].val<x]=pcnt;
            pushup(pcnt);
            pushup(f);
            splay(pcnt);
            return;
        }
    }
}

ll grank(ll x)
{
    ll res=0,cur=rt;
    while(1)
    {
        if(tr[cur].val>x)
            cur=ls(cur);
        else
        {
            res+=tr[ls(cur)].sz;
            if(tr[cur].val==x)
            {
                splay(cur);
                return res+1;
            }
            res+=tr[cur].cnt;
            cur=rs(cur);
        }
    }
}

ll xth(ll x)
{
    ll cur=rt;
    while(1)
    {
        if(ls(cur)&&tr[ls(cur)].sz>=x)
            cur=ls(cur);
        else
        {
            x-=tr[ls(cur)].sz+tr[cur].cnt;
            if(x<=0)
            {
                splay(cur);
                return tr[cur].val;
            }
            cur=rs(cur);
        }
    }
}

ll pre()
{
    ll cur=ls(rt);
    if(!cur)
        return 0;
    while(rs(cur)) cur=rs(cur);
    splay(cur);
    return cur;
}

ll nxt()
{
    ll cur=rs(rt);
    if(!cur)
        return 0;
    while(ls(cur)) cur=ls(cur);
    splay(cur);
    return cur;
}

void del(ll x)
{
    grank(x);
    if(tr[rt].cnt>1)
    {
        tr[rt].cnt--;
        splay(rt);
        return;
    }
    if(!rs(rt)&&!ls(rt))
    {
        rt=0;
        return;
    }
    if(!ls(rt)||!rs(rt))
    {
        rt=ls(rt)+rs(rt);
        fa[rt]=0;
        return;
    }
    ll cur=rt;
    ll y=pre();
    fa[rs(cur)]=y;
    rs(y)=rs(cur);
    pushup(rt);
}

int main()
{
    ll n;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    while(n--)
    {
        ll op,x;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&op,&x);
        if(op==1)
            ins(x);
        if(op==2)
            del(x);
        if(op==3)
            printf("%lld\n",grank(x));
        if(op==4)
            printf("%lld\n",xth(x));
        if(op==5)
            ins(x),printf("%lld\n",tr[pre()].val),del(x);
        if(op==6)
            ins(x),printf("%lld\n",tr[nxt()].val),del(x);
    }

    return 0;
}

å‡¸é€é•œæˆåƒåŸç†æ˜¯ä¸ªæœ‰æ„æ€çš„çŸ¥è¯†ã€‚åˆäºŒæ•™ç§‘ä¹¦ä¼šä»¥å®éªŒçš„æ–¹å¼å‘Šè¯‰æˆ‘ä»¬åŸç†ã€‚

å¿«è¦å‚åŠ ä¸­è€ƒäº†ï¼Œå¤ä¹ çš„æ—¶å€™è€å¸ˆè¯´äº†ä¸€æ¡å…¬å¼ï¼š

$$ \frac{1}{u}+\frac{1}{v}=\frac{1}{f} $$

ä½†å®ƒä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯å¯¹çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ¥è¯æ˜ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚

è¯æ˜

$$ \frac{1}{u}+\frac{1}{v}=\frac{1}{f} $$

$è¯ï¼š$

$\because\triangle ABO\triangle A’B’O$ $\qquad$ (ä¸‰è§’å½¢ABOç›¸ä¼¼äºä¸‰è§’å½¢A’B’O)

$\therefore AB:A’B’=u:v$

$\because\triangle COFâˆ½\triangle A’B’F$

$\therefore CO:A’B’=f:(v-f)$

$\because å››è¾¹å½¢ABOCä¸ºçŸ©å½¢$

$\therefore AB=CO$

$\therefore AB:A’B’=f:(v-f)$ $\therefore u:v=f:(v-f)$

$\therefore u(v-f)=vf$

$\therefore uv-uf=vf$

$\because uvf\neq 0$

$\therefore \frac{uv}{uvf}-\frac{uf}{uvf}=\frac{vf}{uvf}$

$\therefore \frac{1}{f}-\frac{1}{v}=\frac{1}{u}$

$å³$

æ­¥éª¤

ã€€ã€€ï¼ˆä¸€ï¼‰ä¸ºä¾¿äºç”¨å‡½æ•°æ³•è§£å†³æ­¤é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå°†å‡¸é€é•œçš„ä¸»å…‰è½´ä¸å¹³é¢ç›´è§’åæ ‡ç³»çš„æ¨ªåæ ‡è½´ï¼ˆ$x$ è½´ï¼‰å…³è”ï¼ˆå³é‡åˆï¼‰ï¼Œå°†å‡¸é€é•œçš„ç†æƒ³æŠ˜å°„é¢ä¸çºµåæ ‡è½´ï¼ˆ$y$ è½´ï¼‰å…³è”ï¼Œå°†å‡¸é€é•œçš„å…‰å¿ƒä¸åæ ‡åŸç‚¹å…³è”.åˆ™ï¼šç‚¹ $A$ çš„åæ ‡ä¸º $(-u,c)$ï¼Œç‚¹ $F$ çš„åæ ‡ä¸º $(f,0)$ï¼Œç‚¹ $A’$ çš„åæ ‡ä¸º $(v,-d)$ï¼Œç‚¹ $C$ çš„åæ ‡ä¸º $(0,c)$.

ã€€ã€€ï¼ˆäºŒï¼‰å°† $AA’$ï¼Œ$A’C$ åŒå‘å»¶é•¿ä¸ºç›´çº¿ $l_1$,$l_2$ï¼Œè§†ä½œä¸¤æ¡å‡½æ•°å›¾è±¡.ç”±å›¾è±¡å¯çŸ¥ï¼šç›´çº¿ $l_1$ ä¸ºæ­£æ¯”ä¾‹å‡½æ•°å›¾è±¡ï¼Œç›´çº¿ $l_2$ ä¸ºä¸€æ¬¡å‡½æ•°å›¾è±¡.

ã€€ã€€ï¼ˆä¸‰ï¼‰è®¾ç›´çº¿ $l_1$ çš„è§£æå¼ä¸º $y=k_1x$ï¼Œç›´çº¿ $l_2$ çš„è§£æå¼ä¸º $y=k_2x+b$.

ä¾é¢˜æ„ï¼Œå°† $A(-u,c)$ï¼Œ$C(0,c)$ï¼Œ$F(f,0)$ ä»£å…¥ç›¸åº”è§£æå¼ï¼Œå¾—

$$ \begin{cases} c=-uk_1\\ c=b\\ 0=k_2f+b \end{cases} $$

å¾—

$$ \begin{cases} k_1=-\frac{c}{u}x\\ k_2=-\frac{c}{f} \end{cases} $$

$\therefore ä¸¤å‡½æ•°è§£æå¼ä¸º$

$$ y=-\frac{c}{u}x\\ y=-\frac{c}{f}x+c $$

$\therefore ä¸¤å‡½æ•°äº¤ç‚¹ A’(x,y) æ»¡è¶³æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„$

$$ \begin{cases} y=-\frac{c}{u}x\\ y=-\frac{c}{f}x+c \end{cases} $$

$\because A’(v,-d)$

$$\therefore \begin{cases} -d=-\frac{c}{u}v\\-d=-\frac{c}{f}v+c \end{cases}$$

$\therefore -\frac{c}{u}v=-\frac{c}{f}v+c=-d$

$\therefore \frac{c}{u}v=\frac{c}{f}v+c=d$

$\therefore \frac{cv}{u}=\frac{cv}{f}+c$

$\therefore cvf=cuv-cuf$ï¼ˆä¸¤è¾¹åŒä¹˜ $uf$ï¼‰

$\therefore vf=uv-uf$

$\because uvf\neq0$

$\therefore \frac{vf}{uvf}=\frac{uv}{uvf}-\frac{uf}{uvf}$

$\therefore \frac{1}{u}=\frac{1}{f}-\frac{1}{v}$

$å³$

$\frac{1}{u}+\frac{1}{v}=\frac{1}{f}$

$è¯æ¯•.$

Dijkstra

ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯Dijkstra

Dijkstraé‡‡ç”¨äº†è´ªå¿ƒçš„ç­–ç•¥ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int n, m;
int edge[505][505];
int ss, tt;
bool vis[505];
pair<int, int> dis[505]; // ç›¸å½“äºä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡é‡Œæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæˆå‘˜ï¼šä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯è·ç¦»ï¼Œå¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯æ•°ç»„ä¸‹æ ‡æ‰€è¿æ¥çš„ç‚¹
vector<int> q[505];

bool cmp(int a, int b)
{
    return a < b;
}

int main()
{
    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); // è¾“å…¥ç‚¹çš„ä¸ªæ•°nï¼Œè¾¹çš„æ•°é‡m

    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++)
    {
        int l, r, v;
        scanf("%d%d%d", &l, &r, &v); // è¾“å…¥è¾¹çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼šè¾¹è¿æ¥çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹lã€rï¼Œå’Œè¾¹çš„æƒå€¼v

        edge[l][r] = v; // è¡¨ç¤ºä»låˆ°rè¿™ä¸ªç‚¹çš„æƒå€¼æ˜¯v
    /* å› ä¸ºè¿™ä¸ªä»£ç æ˜¯æœ‰å‘å›¾çš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯æ— å‘å›¾çš„è¯åº”è¯¥å†åŠ ä¸Šä¸‹é¢è¿™è¡Œä»£ç ï¼š

    edge[r][l] = v;

    è¿™ä¸ªè¡¨ç¤ºråˆ°lçš„è·¯å¾„è¾¹æƒæ˜¯v */
    }

    scanf("%d%d", &ss, &tt); // è¾“å…¥ssï¼ˆåŸç‚¹ï¼‰å’Œttï¼ˆç»ˆç‚¹ï¼‰ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªä»£ç æ˜¯è¾“å‡ºä»ssåˆ°ttçš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        dis[i].first = 1e9; // åˆå§‹åŒ–ä»åŸç‚¹åˆ°ç¬¬iä¸ªç‚¹çš„è·¯å¾„å…¨éƒ¨ä¸ºæ­£æ— ç©·ï¼ˆè¿™é‡Œåªè¦æ•°æ®å¤Ÿå¤§å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼‰
    fill(vis, vis + n + 1, 0); // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ‰€æœ‰çš„ç‚¹éƒ½æ²¡è¢«è®¿é—®è¿‡
    dis[ss].first = 0; // ä»åŸç‚¹åˆ°åŸç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»è‚¯å®šæ˜¯0
    dis[ss].second = ss; // é»˜è®¤åŸç‚¹å’ŒåŸç‚¹ç›¸è¿

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
    {
        int tmp = -1; // å­˜å‚¨ä¸‹æ ‡çš„ä¸´æ—¶å˜é‡

        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++)
        {
            if (!vis[j] && (tmp == -1 || dis[j] < dis[tmp]))
            {
        // åªè¦ (jæœªè¢«è®¿é—®è¿‡) å¹¶ä¸”åªè¦è¾¾åˆ° [(tmpæœªèµ‹å€¼) æˆ– (æ‰¾åˆ°ç¦»iç‚¹æœ‰æ›´è¿‘çš„ç‚¹)] çš„æ¡ä»¶ä¹‹ä¸€
                tmp = j;
        // tmpå°±èµ‹å€¼ä¸ºj
            }
        }

        vis[tmp] = 1; // å®Œäº‹ä¹‹åï¼Œå¤‡æ³¨tmpå·²ç»è¢«è®¿é—®è¿‡äº†ï¼Œä¸¢è¿›**åƒï½åœ¾ï½æ¡¶ï½**é‡Œ
        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++)
        {
            if (dis[tmp].first + edge[tmp][j] < dis[j].first && tmp != j && edge[tmp][j])
            {
        /*
          å¦‚æœ (åˆ°tmpçš„è·ç¦» + tmpåˆ°jçš„è·ç¦» < åŸæ¥åˆ°jçš„è·ç¦»)
          å¹¶ä¸”
          (tmpå’Œjä¸æ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹)
          å¹¶ä¸”
          (tmpåˆ°jçš„è·ç¦»ä¸æ˜¯0)
          çš„è¯
            */
        dis[j].first = dis[tmp].first + edge[tmp][j];
                dis[j].second = tmp;
        // åˆ°jçš„è·ç¦»é‡æ–°èµ‹å€¼ï¼Œä¸jç›¸é‚»çš„ç‚¹å°±å˜ä¸ºtmp
            }
        }
    }

    printf("%d\n", dis[tt].first); // è¾“å‡ºç»ˆç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»

    int temp = tt;
    while (dis[temp].second != ss) // åªè¦ä¸tempè¿™ä¸ªä¸´æ—¶å˜é‡ç›¸é‚»çš„ä¸æ˜¯èµ·ç‚¹ï¼Œå°±è¿›è¡Œ
    {
        ans.push_back(temp); // æŠŠtempå­˜å‚¨è¿›ansæ•°ç»„é‡Œ
        temp = dis[temp].second; // tempå°±é‡æ–°èµ‹å€¼
    }
    ans.push_back(temp); // æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ä¼šè·³å‡ºå¾ªç¯ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦å­˜å‚¨
    ans.push_back(ss); // æŠŠåŸç‚¹ä¹Ÿæ”¾è¿›å»

    for (int i = ans.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--)
    {
        printf("%d ", ans[i]); // å€’è¿‡æ¥è¾“å‡ºå°±è¡Œäº†
    }
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int n, m;
struct edge
{
    int s, e, val;
};
int maxx = INT_MIN;
int step;
vector<edge> b[5005];
queue<int> q;
int dis[5005];
bool vis[5005];

int main()
{
    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);

    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++)
    {
        int x, y, v;
        edge ee;
        scanf("%d%d%d", &x, &y, &v);

        ee.s = x, ee.e = y, ee.val = v;

        b[x].push_back(ee); // å­˜å‚¨xçš„é‚»æ¥è¡¨
    }

    fill(dis, dis + n + 1, 1e9); // åˆå§‹åŒ–è·¯å¾„å…¨éƒ¨ä¸ºæ­£æ— ç©·ï¼ˆæ•°æ®è¶³å¤Ÿå¤§å°±è¡Œï¼‰

    q.push(1);
    dis[1] = 0;
    vis[1] = 1;
    while (!q.empty())
    { // STLå®½æœ
        step++;
        if (step > m)
        { // å‡ºç°è´Ÿç¯ï¼Œç›´æ¥é€€å‡º
            printf("No Solution");
            return 0;
        }

        int u = q.front();
        q.pop();

        for (int i = 0; i < b[u].size(); i++)
        { // å¯¹äºå½“å‰è¿™ä¸ªuç‚¹çš„é‚»æ¥ç‚¹
            int vv = b[u][i].val;
            int en = b[u][i].e;

            if (dis[u] + vv < dis[en])
            { // å¦‚æœ (åˆ°uç‚¹è·ç¦») + (ä»uç‚¹åˆ°å®ƒçš„é‚»æ¥ç‚¹çš„è·ç¦») < (åŸæ¥çš„åˆ°ençš„è·ç¦»)
                dis[en] = dis[u] + vv;

                if (!vis[en])
                { // åœ¨å‹å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¹‹å‰è¿›è¡Œæ ‡è®°ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¼šé™·å…¥æ­»å¾ªç¯
                    vis[en] = 1;
                    q.push(en);
                }
            }
        }

        vis[u] = 0; // æ ‡è®°è¿™ä¸ªç‚¹ã€Š å… è´¹ ã€‹äº†ï¼ˆfreeè¿™ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼‰
    }

    printf("%d", dis[n]);
}

å› ä¸ºæ›¾æœ‰â€œå…³äº SPFA â€”â€”ä»–æ­»äº†â€çš„ä¸€è¯´ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿™ä¸ªå°±å¾ˆåƒé¦™ã€‚æ›´å¥½çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå’Œ SPFA ä»£ç å®ç°å¾ˆåƒï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›´æ¥å…¥æ‰‹æ˜¯å¾ˆå®¹æ˜“çš„ã€‚

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define int long long
#define pb push_back

const int MAXN=500+5,MAXM=500+5,INF=0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;

int n,m;
int dis[MAXN];
bool vis[MAXN];
int su,en[MAXM<<1],vl[MAXM<<1],hd[MAXN],lt[MAXM<<1];
struct node
{
    int id,dis;
    bool operator>(const node &T)const
    {
        return dis>T.dis;
    }
};

void add(int u,int v,int w)
{
    en[++su]=v,vl[su]=w,lt[su]=hd[u],hd[u]=su;
}

int Dij()
{
    priority_queue<node,vector<node>,greater<node>> q;
    memset(vis,0,sizeof(vis));
    memset(dis,0x3f,sizeof(dis));
    dis[1]=0,vis[1]=1;
    q.push({1,0});
    while(!q.empty())
    {
        int u=q.top().id;q.pop();
        for(int i=hd[u];i;i=lt[i])
        {
            int v=en[i],w=vl[i];
            if(dis[v]>dis[u]+w)
            {
                dis[v]=dis[u]+w;
                if(!vis[v])
                {
                    vis[v]=1;
                    q.push({v,dis[v]});
                }
            }
        }
        vis[u]=0;
    }
    if(dis[n]==INF)
        return -1;
    return dis[n];
}

signed main()
{
    scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
    for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        int u,v,w;
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&u,&v,&w);
        add(u,v,w),add(v,u,w);
    }
    printf("%lld\n",Dij());
    return 0;
}

æœ´ç´  Dijï¼š$O(n^2)$ SPFAï¼š$O(nm)$ï¼ˆæœ€åæƒ…å†µï¼‰ Floydï¼š$O(n^3)$
